content: --वर्चस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} --वर्चसं {1} divine glory or splendour, spiritual pre-eminence or holiness resulting from sacred knowledge; (तस्य) हेतुस्त्वद्ब्रह्मवर्चसं <ls>R. 1. 63</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 37</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">4. 94.</ls> {2} the inherent sanctity or power of a Brāhmaṇa; <ls>Ś. 6.</ls>
